patient_info: Cardiomegaly,Dyspnea,Abdominal distention,Exercise intolerance,Poor appetite,Myocarditis,Increased circulating NT-proBNP concentration
golden_diagnosis: Neonatal Marfan syndrome,Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Cardiomyopathy, dilated
2. Heart failure with preserved ejection fraction (HFpEF)
3. Pericardial disease with effusion
4. Myocarditis, viral or idiopathic
5. Cardiomyopathy, restrictive
6. Pulmonary hypertension, especially if secondary to heart disease
7. Mixed connective tissue disease with cardiac involvement
8. Amyloidosis, cardiac involvement
9. Endocardial fibroelastosis
10. Metabolic storage disorder, such as Pompe disease or Fabry disease, with cardiac manifestations.
